Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 17 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 13 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Fire Breath, The Dragon exhales fire in a cone.  Each creature caught in the cone takes an Average 55 Fire damage
Other Actions.Action 3: Weaking Breath, The Dragon exhales gas in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area makes a Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Dragon can breathe air and water
